This segment also provides services and repairs to its energy product customers, including under warranty; and various financing options to its residential customers. The company was formerly known as Tesla Motors, Inc. and changed its name to Tesla, Inc. in February 2017. reuters_tesla = search_web_with_text_content("site:reuters.com \"TESLA\" (TSLA) product launch market expansion technology stock price \"past year\"", 5)

nodes.description: Generate a comprehensive and visually appealing HTML report summarizing the research findings, including graphs, tables, and comparisons. Incorporate the analysis of financial data, news events, competitive landscape, and market trends.
nodes.agent_prompt: Generate a comprehensive and visually appealing HTML report on TESLA. Use the financial data analysis from T005, the news event analysis from T006, the competitor comparison from T007, and the market trend analysis from T008. Include graphs, tables, and comparisons to illustrate key findings. Ensure the report is well-formatted, polished, and suitable for presentation to senior management. Include sections on financial performance, market position, competitive analysis, and future outlook. Focus on making the report as exhaustive as possible. Focus on making the report as visually appealing as possible with charts, tables etc.
